title: Was Dan Blocker aka Hoss Cartwright the emcee at the Azalea festival in 1967 ? My parents took me as a child and remember this but i can find no record of it.Thank you
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/01/was-actor-dan-blocker-a-k-a-hoss-cartwright-of-bonanza-the-emcee-at-the-1967-n-c-azalea-festival/
